name: Adrestia
description:
Adrestia is a turn-based battle game played in quick rounds. Take turns casting up to three spells a turn, then let them fly! Dominate your enemy with strategy and wit.

⬡ Ad-free!
⬡ Fast rounds of only a few minutes!
⬡ Practice against an AI, or challenge your friends with online multiplayer!
⬡ Seven books and 28 spells to master.

Can you be the next Master Wizard?
